wordGroup: garment industry 制衣业；成衣业
garment factory 服装厂，成衣工厂
garment bag 保护衣服用的塑胶套
silk garment 丝绸服装；绸衣

sentences.en: This garment must be dry-cleaned only.
He was wearing a strange shapeless garment.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件没样子的奇怪衣服。

sentences.en: China will host an exhibition of international garment machinery.
sentences.cn: 中国将主办国际服装机械展览会。
